kpi_info.title: FAIL_MO_PDP_CONTEXT_DEACT
kpi_info.use: Number of MO PDP context deactivation failures. When the PDP context has been removed locally by the network, and MS attempts to remove the PDP context after that. For example, when the MS attempts to remove a PDP context, which, for any reason, does not exist in the SGSN anymore.
